name: International Atomic Energy Agency - Electronic Safety Standards Platform
description: Streamlined the creation and maintenance of Nuclear Safety Standards (NSS) documentation through a secure, collaborative platform with centralized governance and standardized publishing workflows.
challenge: Manual document creation lacked collaboration, version control, and modular review capabilities, with no integration between safety standards and centralized repositories, leading to inefficiencies and missing key publications.
solution: Secure, audit-cleared platform designed per IAEA guidelines with centralized governance
User-friendly, collaborative publishing and review capabilities
Standardized, configurable publishing system with consistent styling and formatting
Workflow-based revisions to streamline content creation and approvals
Scalable solution with strong reporting engine

impact.adoptedByTenants: NS and NE tenants with more onboarding
impact.securityCompliance: Designed per stringent IAEA security guidelines
impact.businessValue: Positioned Accion as preferred choice for solution delivery

outcomes: Positioned as preferred provider among competitors
Built robust cybersecurity framework from ground up
